Question
========
If you want the RStudio-style shortcut for toggling comments, how can you change it in Positron?

Answerlist
----------
* Open Keyboard Shortcuts from the gear menu and edit the binding for the toggle comment command
* Change your system keyboard layout
* Modify the R script manually before running it
* Install RStudio alongside Positron

Solution
========
Use the Keyboard Shortcuts panel (gear icon) to edit the toggle comment shortcut to your preferred keys.
